description.narrative:
The SDG Partnership is an international cooperation between national youth councils in Ukraine, Zimbabwe and Denmark. The mission is to ensure meaningful youth participation in creating a more sustainable world by empowering young people to become agents of change in their local contexts, and to promoting the legitimate voice of the global youth in SDG implementation and decision-making. The SDG Partnership believes youth is an integral part of any society, its decision-making processes and play crucial role in achieving the SDGs. Legitimate, democratic national youth councils work as platforms for youth representation and advocacy for youth participation and influence in society, and work to further intercultural mutual understanding and peaceful societies.
The SDG Partnership has three objectives. As national youth councils and as a partnership, we strive to: 1. Become champions of the SDGs/the 2030 Agenda 2. Be legitimate, inclusive, and democratic platforms for youth participation and representation 3. Advocate for youth participation and representation in forums nationally, regionally, and globally
